1189750.name: WinTweaker
1189750.description:
Features:

  • WinTweaker allows you to customize the system according to your needs.
  • The performance engine ensures that the maximum performance is available.
  • The 'Monitor' allows you to monitor your hardware (Local and Remote).
  • (Remote-)Task Manager
  • The AdBlocker removes annoying ads and improves the speed of your web pages.
  • Enables the use of an alternative TaskManager.
  • Allows to close file handles during runtime.
  • Provides you with the well-known Windows 7 Volume Manager (also on Windows 11).
  • Low CPU usage
  • Autorun works without Steam


Process Profiles (Count): 216
Process Engine (Count): 47
Service Profiles (Count): 30

Planned for future updates:

  • Dreamscene Version 2 (Steam Workshop)
  • Advanced cursor customization (Steam Workshop)
  • Customizable Windows sounds (Steam Workshop)

    If you have any other suggestions, or if you have found a bug, please send them to info@giga-core.com
